import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { fabi, to } from '../config' import Web3 from 'web3' const NewCustomer = () => { const [State, setState] = useState({ account: '' }) const [data, setData] = useState({ month: '', height: '', weight: '', age:'' }) const {month, height, weight, age} = data const onClick = e => ({...data,[e.target.id]:e.target.value}) async function load () { const web3 = new Web3(Web3.givenProvider || "HTTP://127.0.0.1:7545") const todo = new web3.eth.Contract(fabi, to) const accounts = await web3.eth.getAccounts() setState({ todo }) setState({...State,account:accounts[0]}) } const onSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() State.todo.methods.pay(month, height, weight, age).send({from:this.State.ac}) } useEffect(() => { load() }, []) return (


Enter Credentials

Account : {State.account}

onClick(e)} class="form-control" id="height" />
onClick(e)} class="form-control" id="weight" />
onClick(e)} class="form-control" id="age" />
onClick(e)} class="form-control" id="month" />


) } export default NewCustomer
